title: 820-2330 - 820-2532 Macbook Pro 15's A1281 battery
message:
since you cant buy new genuine apple battery and you have no other option but to buy the compatible battery.

is it ok to ignore battery temp test in ASD, will it get slow performances because is a sensor thing?

[IMG type="full" width="200px"]https://i.imgur.com/dR8DmK5.jpg[/IMG]

title: 820-2330 - 820-2532 Macbook Pro 15's A1281 battery
message: Yeah there is no other choice. These fake batteries do sometimes charge very slowly, but it is the only thing you can get for these antiques.

title: 820-2330 - 820-2532 Macbook Pro 15's A1281 battery
message:
cheers.

yeah, i've notice the charging speed is slow. i bought two brands to try out. SLODA doesnt have sensor issue and charges quick. Runpower does have sensor issue and charges slowly.

title: 820-2330 - 820-2532 Macbook Pro 15's A1281 battery
message: Yeah, the ones with sensor errors charge slow, it is a well known long standing issue with this garbage. Oh China.......
